definitions.definition: a comb or tuft of feathers, fur, or skin on the head of a bird or other animal.
examples: comb, plume, tuft of feathers the bird's crest

definitions.definition: a thing resembling a tuft, especially a plume of feathers on a helmet.
the top of something, especially a mountain or hill.
examples: she reached the crest of the hill

definitions.definition: the curling foamy top of a wave.
a ridge along the surface of a bone.
the upper line of the neck of a horse or other mammal.

a distinctive device borne above the shield of a coat of arms (originally as worn on a helmet), or separately reproduced, for example on writing paper or silverware, to represent a family or corporate body.
examples: insignia, regalia, badge, emblem, heraldic device, coat of arms, arms our family crest

definitions.definition: reach the top of (something such as a hill or wave).
examples: she crested a hill and saw the valley spread out before her

definitions.definition: (of a river) rise to its highest level.
examples: the river was expected to crest at eight feet above flood stage

definitions.definition: (of a wave) form a curling foamy top.
have attached or affixed at the top.
examples: his helmet was crested with a fan of spikes
